mapper.select: SELECT L.LESSON_ID ,(SELECT CONCAT(C.CENTER_NAME, ' ', C.CENTER_LOCATION, '점') FROM CENTER C WHERE C.CENTER_ID = L.CENTER_ID) AS CENTER ,L.LESSON_NAME ,(SELECT I.INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM INSTRUCTOR I WHERE I.INSTRUCTOR_ID = L.INSTRUCTOR_ID) AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE R WHERE R.LESSON_ID = L.LESSON_ID AND R.RESERVE_DATE = #{selectDate} AND R.CANCEL_AT = 0) AS CURRENT_PERSONNEL ,L.PERSONNEL ,L.LESSON_DAY ,L.START_TIME ,L.END_TIME FROM LESSON L WHERE L.LESSON_DAY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{day}, '%')

SELECT L.LESSON_ID ,(SELECT CONCAT(C.CENTER_NAME, ' ', C.CENTER_LOCATION, '점') FROM CENTER C WHERE C.CENTER_ID = L.CENTER_ID) AS CENTER ,L.LESSON_NAME ,(SELECT I.INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM INSTRUCTOR I WHERE I.INSTRUCTOR_ID = L.INSTRUCTOR_ID) AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE R WHERE R.LESSON_ID = L.LESSON_ID AND R.RESERVE_DATE = #{selectDate} AND R.CANCEL_AT = 0) AS CURRENT_PERSONNEL ,L.PERSONNEL ,L.LESSON_DAY ,L.START_TIME ,L.END_TIME FROM LESSON L WHERE L.LESSON_ID = #{lessonId}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVE SET CANCEL_AT=1 WHERE RESERVE_ID=#{reserveId}
mapper.select: SELECT R.RESERVE_ID, R.USER_ID, R.RESERVE_DATE, L.LESSON_ID, L.LESSON_NAME, I.INSTRUCTOR_NAME AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE R2 WHERE R2.LESSON_ID = L.LESSON_ID AND R2.RESERVE_DATE = #{today} AND R2.CANCEL_AT = 0) AS CURRENT_PERSONNEL, l.PERSONNEL, l.LESSON_DAY, l.START_TIME, l.END_TIME FROM RESERVE R LEFT JOIN LESSON L ON R.LESSON_ID = L.LESSON_ID LEFT JOIN CENTER C ON L.CENTER_ID = C.CENTER_ID LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR I ON L.INSTRUCTOR_ID = I.INSTRUCTOR_ID WHERE R.USER_ID = #{userId} AND R.RESERVE_DATE = #{today} AND R.CANCEL_AT = 0
